Text: Detroit Metropolitan Wayne County Airport (IATA: DTW, ICAO: KDTW, FAA LID: DTW) , usually called Detroit Metro Airport, Metro Airport, or just DTW, is a major international airport in the United States covering 4,850 acre in Romulus, Michigan, a suburb of Detroit.

Text: Detroit Metropolitan Airport:  It is Michigan's busiest airport, and one of the largest airline hubs in the country.
